name: Leon LITTLE a/k/a Jason Gravely, Petitioner v. In the COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Little v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Leon LITTLE a/k/a Jason Gravely, Petitioner v. In the COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of June, 2009, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
973 A.2d 413
Leon LITTLE a/k/a Jason Gravely, Petitioner v. In the COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 14 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 3, 2009.
